summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 2, Hazelwood Supplemental Addition, being the alley between 24th Avenue North and 25th Avenue North, from East Highland Drive to East Lee Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 124937 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
